Event Storage Solutions From Coast to Coast

Our locker trucks and mobile back check systems provide efficient, effective, and simple services for events of all types, sizes, and duration.

Large Events
and Venues

Give fans and attendees the option to lock it up with us at stadiums, arenas, ballparks, concerts, and festivals. Learn More

Competitive Events

Create a stress-free race for runners, cyclists, and OCR competitors by offering locker rentals on their big day. Learn More

Conferences and Business Rentals

Make life easier for your conference attendees, seasonal staff, and production teams with convenient onsite storage for their stuff. Learn More
How It Works

We Make it Easy to Lock It Up at Your Events

We like to say, “Tell us where to park, we’ll take it from there!” We’ll create a custom plan based on your specific storage needs, and operate totally independently onsite so you can lock it up without adding to your plate! We offer:

Lock It Up With Us!

Our onsite operations teams are always ready for more events. We can be ready with as little as 24-hours notice (although we prefer a bit more of a head’s up!). Connect with one of our team members today:

Molly O'Conner

Founder + CEO Molly launched The Mobile Locker Co in 2014, and has managed hundreds of events since. She knows the ins and outs of onsite operations and will help you determine the best solution for your storage needs! molly@themobilelockerco.com LinkedIn

Diane Brickley

National Accounts Diane’s extensive experience in the sports/entertainment and hospitality industries means she knows what security, operations, and guest experience teams need. From NFL games to MLB homestands to large-scale concerts, she creates mutually beneficial partnerships for TMLC and our partners. hello@themobilelockerco.com LinkedIn
